dcterms:description: The Stanford Sentiment Treebank consists of 8,544 movie reviews, with a vocabulary of over 16K words. It is used for evaluating spell correctors.
dcterms:title: Stanford Sentiment Treebank (SST)

dcterms:description: IMDB movie reviews contain 54,000 movie reviews, with a vocabulary of over 78K words. It serves as a background corpus for evaluating spell correctors.
dcterms:title: IMDB movie reviews
